content: Most regular fighters head into their respective matchups hoping to get the win and come away from their fights unscathed. But Justin Gaethje isn’t a regular MMA fighter.Gaethje will take on Tony Ferguson for the vacant UFC interim lightweight title in the … [+2324 chars]
title_cleaned: JUSTIN GAETHJE REVEALS UNUSUAL UFC BREAK NOSE TITLE

title: Jussier Formiga meets Alex Perez at UFC 250 on June 6
description: A flyweight bout between Jussier Formiga and Alex Perez is the latest addition to June's UFC 250.
author: Nolan King
content: A flyweight bout between Jussier Formiga and Alex Perez is the latest addition to June’s UFC 250.MMA Junkie verified the matchup between Formiga (23-7 MMA, 9-6 UFC) and Perez (23-5 MMA, 5-1 UFC) with a person close to the situation following an initial repo… [+1134 chars]
title_cleaned: JUSSIER FORMIGA MEETS ALEX PEREZ UFC JUNE

title: UFC President Dana White says sports can resume but will 'lose a lot of money'
description: Ultimate Fighting Championship President Dana White said Tuesday he believes many sports leagues could resume competition but it would come at a price.
title_cleaned: UFC PRESIDENT DANA SPORTS RESUME LOSE LOT MONEY
